issue.title: Model insertion/deletion not properly logged/played back

content.raw:
I'm having a hard time pointing the exact moment when logging insertions and deletions started working. It was probably sometime between Gazebo 5 and Gazebo 6, when a lot of improvements were made to playback, adding rewind functionality.

If I remember correctly though, insertion / deletion was broken if the user rewinded the log, i.e.:

* Play past insertion / deletion point
* Rewind before that point - **insertion / deletion is not undone**
* Re-play that point - **undefined state**

Maybe @caguero, who implemented the awesome rewind feature, remembers at which point things started working and to which extent they did.

Right now, pull request #2608 is fixing insertion / deletion for lights, and while echoing or filtering a log file.
content.html:
I'm having a hard time pointing the exact moment when logging insertions and deletions started working. It was probably sometime between Gazebo 5 and Gazebo 6, when a lot of improvements were made to playback, adding rewind functionality.

If I remember correctly though, insertion / deletion was broken if the user rewinded the log, i.e.:

  • Play past insertion / deletion point
  • Rewind before that point - insertion / deletion is not undone
  • Re-play that point - undefined state

Maybe @caguero, who implemented the awesome rewind feature, remembers at which point things started working and to which extent they did.

Right now, pull request #2608 is fixing insertion / deletion for lights, and while echoing or filtering a log file.
